title: Vocabulary Entry
description: Canonical specification for vocabulary entries used in the Postgres ingestion pipeline.

word.description: The headword (modern English form). Must be unique.

usage_example.description: Sentence showing natural contextual use of the word.

synonyms.description: List of words with similar meaning. Optional.

antonyms.description: List of words with opposite meaning. Optional.

related.description: Conceptually linked words (not strict synonyms). Optional.

common_collocations.description: Frequent idiomatic phrases with short glosses. Optional.

french_equiv.description: French equivalent with register and nuance notes.

story.description: Chronological narrative timeline of semantic evolution.

century.description: Century or range, e.g., '12', '17', or '-1' for BCE.

story_text.description: Narrative description of the word’s sense and context at that stage.

sibling_words.description: Words from the same etymological family during that era.

context.description: Cultural, legal, or technological environment shaping meaning.

structural_analysis.description: Synthesis paragraph identifying the major semantic forces across time.

date_added.description: ISO date string for tracking when entry was added.
